work.company: Unique Identification Authority of India, Government of India
work.position: Software Engineer (Java, Microsfot SQL, Hibernate, jQuery, HTML/CSS)
highlights: Created a web application for internal reporting purposes, feature for manual de-duplication and for displaying the results of the de-duplication efforts.
Created a de-duplication software suite that included the main program used to detect duplicates among new enrolments in the Aadhaar program and the Aadhaar cards already generated.
Decreased runtime of dedeuplication program by ~76% (from ~25 hours to ~6 hours).
